title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 313.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 313.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

To provide a fair, timely, and efficient mechanism for
processing uncontroverted claims involving minor injuries, uncontested issues
within a claim, and certain penalties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
313.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
